Responsible.definition: liable to be called on to answer b
Responsible.origin: [awarded the contract to the lowest bidder]

1 a.definition: liable to be called on to answer

sub_terms.b: liable to be called to account as the primary cause, motive, or agent
sub_terms.c: liable to legal review or in case of fault to penalties

2.definition: characterized by trustworthiness, integrity, and requisite abilities and resources [awarded the contract to the lowest bidder]

3.definition: able to choose for oneself between right and wrong

4.definition: marked by or involving accountability [a office]
